oldentry: Popular explanation: flicking a marble with the thumb.
verblex: 1. To play a game of marbles, to flick a marble with your thumb.
nomlex: 1. A children's game played with small balls made of coloured glass. You roll a ball along the ground and try to hit an opponent's ball with it. English = marbles.
2. One of the small balls used by children in the game of marbles. English = marble.
